text: Dimasangcay Pundato (December 21, 1947 â€“ August 13, 2020) a Muslim Filipino revolutionary leader and politician.Office of the Presidential Adviser for Peace Process He was born in Dansalan, Lanao. For nine years, he was a member of the Office on Muslim Affairs (OMA) under the Office of the President during the administrations of the President Cory Aquino and President Fidel V. Ramos. He was Vice Chairman of the Moro National Liberation Front (MNLF) and Chairman of the MNLF Reformist Group.The Moro National Liberation Front-Reformist Group Pundato died at his home in Marawi on August 13, 2020, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino politicians Category:Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao
title: Dimasangcay Pundato
